name: Indomilk Full Cream Milk Powder
description: Indomilk Full Cream Milk Powder is a high-quality milk powder made from fresh cow's milk. It is rich in nutrients and has a creamy taste, making it perfect for cooking, baking, or enjoying as a drink.

name: Indomilk UHT
